sentences.en: If we give her enough rope, she will hang herself.
sentences.cn: 如果我们让她为所欲为，她一定会栽大跟头的。

sentences.en: She cut herself on some broken glass.
She didn't want to commit herself one way or the other.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样，她都不想明确表态。

sentences.en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
sentences.cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

sentences.en: She had long hair she'd bleached herself, all yellowy and orangey.
sentences.cn: 她一头长发，全部被她自己给染成了淡黄色和浅橙色。

sentences.en: She has a knack of landing herself right in the soup.
sentences.cn: 她老是让自己的处境很尴尬。

sentences.en: She is not herself. She came near to a breakdown.
sentences.cn: 她身体不舒服，简直要崩溃了。

sentences.en: She learned to wire and plumb the house herself.
sentences.cn: 她学会了自己给房子拉接电线、敷设水管。

sentences.en: She made a fanning motion, pretending to cool herself off.
sentences.cn: 她做了个扇风的动作，假装想让自己凉快一点。

sentences.en: She made herself a cup of coffee.
She must be very proud of herself.
She seemed to be unable to rouse herself to do anything.
sentences.cn: 她似乎打不起精神去做任何事情。

sentences.en: She threatened to throw herself in front of a train.
She would have cracked up if she hadn't allowed herself some fun.
sentences.cn: 她若是没给自己找点乐趣的话，早就崩溃了。

sentences.en: She'd been caught from behind and hadn't a prayer of freeing herself.
sentences.cn: 有人从后面抓住她，她不可能脱身。

sentences.en: She'd learnt to be herself and to stand up for her convictions.
sentences.cn: 她已经学会了按自己的方式行事，坚持自己的信仰。

sentences.en: Since she knows little Italian, she keeps to herself.
sentences.cn: 因为不怎么懂意大利语，她很少和人交往。

sentences.en: Unable to restrain herself, she rose and went to the phone.
sentences.cn: 她没能克制住自己，起身走向电话。

trans.tran_cn: （反身代词）她自己，（用以加强语气）她亲自，她本人
trans.tran_en: used to show that the woman or girl who does something is affected by her own action
